definitions.definition: Any of various land-dwelling reptiles , of the family Testudinidae ( chiefly Canada , US ) or the order Testudines ( chiefly UK , Australia , New Zealand , Ireland , South Africa , India ) , whose body is enclosed in a shell ( carapace plus plastron ). The animal can withdraw its head and four legs partially into the shell, providing some protection from predators .
Synonym of cat ( sense 11, a wheeled shelter )

main_definition: Any of various land-dwelling reptiles , of the family Testudinidae ( chiefly Canada , US ) or the order Testudines ( chiefly UK , Australia , New Zealand , Ireland , South Africa , India ) , whose body is enclosed in a shell ( carapace plus plastron ). The animal can withdraw its head and four legs partially into the shell, providing some protection from predators .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of cat ( sense 11, a wheeled shelter )
